name: Plot Hole
summary:
After months of careful renovations, the Pleasure Temple finally opens its doors to the public. The last sanctuary for queer fat lust, enormous strangers arrive from all over, feral for the pleasures of fat filth. It's the perfect time for the high priestess to try out the Temple’s latest addition…
